content.prompt: On a global scale, which of the following directly prevented problems such as those alluded to in the map and graph from leading to population decline in the late twentieth century?

choices.label: The development of new forms of global communication and transportation
The extension of the average human life span brought about by medical advances
The greater social acceptance of birth control
The increases in average agricultural yields per acre brought about by the Green Revolution

topic.text: 9.1: Advances in Technology and Exchange after 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
